title: Velocio Homelands honors Indigenous Peoples and raises funds with new jersey
content:
October 11th was Indigenous Peoples Day here in the United States. To help celebrate but also bring awareness to some fantastic Indigenous organizations â€” Velocio and brand ambassador Gregg Deal set out on an extraordinary ride and designed a breathtaking jersey to honor his forebears. Deal, a member of the Pyramid Lake Paiute tribe, found
